name: Rhyhorn
flavorText:
A POKéMON with a
one-track mind.
Once it charges,  it won't stop
running until it
falls asleep.

previous.name: Weezing
previous.flavorText:
Where two kinds
of poison gases
meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a
WEEZING over many
years.

next.name: Rhydon
next.flavorText:
Protected by an
armor-like hide,
it is capable of living in molten
lava of 3,600
degrees.

pokemon.name: Rhyperior
pokemon.flavorText:
It puts rocks in holes in its palms
and uses its muscles to shoot them.
GEODUDE are shot at rare times.
